headline: Firstsource recognized as a Leader in Banking Operations by Everest Group and NelsonHall
summary: Firstsource Solutions Limited (NSE: FSL) (BSE: 532809), a leading global provider of business process management services and an RP-Sanjiv Goenka Group company, has earned dual analyst recognitions for its Banking Operations capabilities – named a Leader and Star Performer in the Everest Group Banking Operations – Services PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025 and a Leader in the NelsonHall NEAT 2025 evaluation for GenAI & Process Automation in Banking across both Operations Services and Process Automati

headline: Is Everest Group (EG) Pricing Its Insurance Upswing Correctly After Recent Share Recovery?
summary: If you are wondering whether Everest Group at around US$341 per share still offers value, it helps to step back and look at what the current price is actually baking in. The stock is flat over the last 7 days, up 10.1% over the past 30 days and 2.0% year to date, while the 1 year return sits at a 5.8% decline and the 5 year return is 58.8%. Recent attention on Everest Group has centered on its role in the insurance and reinsurance space and how investors are weighing that against broader...
